question: 11. How strongly do you agree or disagree with the following statements? - a. I am interested in learning to use data to answer questions in everyday life.
11. How strongly do you agree or disagree with the following statements? - b. I feel intimidated when I have to deal with data and statistics.
11. How strongly do you agree or disagree with the following statements? - c. I find it boring to work with data.
11. How strongly do you agree or disagree with the following statements? - d. I am interested in current science discoveries.
11. How strongly do you agree or disagree with the following statements? - e. I am likely to read an article or watch a show about NASA science.
11. How strongly do you agree or disagree with the following statements? - f. I find the process of interpreting data to be mysterious
11. How strongly do you agree or disagree with the following statements? - g. I understand how scientists learn from NASA data and missions
12. How strongly do you agree or disagree with the following statements? - a. I see myself as a person who can learn from data.
12. How strongly do you agree or disagree with the following statements? - b. My family see me as a STEM person
12. How strongly do you agree or disagree with the following statements? - c. My friends see me as a STEM person
12. How strongly do you agree or disagree with the following statements? - d. My teachers see me as a STEM person
13. How strongly do you agree or disagree with the following statements? - a. Experience working with data helps one become a more effective "consumer" of research findings.
13. How strongly do you agree or disagree with the following statements? - b. Scientific models can change with new evidence
13. How strongly do you agree or disagree with the following statements? - c. It is possible to eliminate all sources of error in an investigation by being precise.
13. How strongly do you agree or disagree with the following statements? - d. It is possible to draw conclusions from imperfect or messy data.
13. How strongly do you agree or disagree with the following statements? - e. Scientists have already found answers to most questions about nature
16. How strongly do you agree or disagree with the following statements? - I enjoyed participating in the Cosmic Data Story activities
16. How strongly do you agree or disagree with the following statements? - I learned something new from the Cosmic Data Story activities
